personal.name: Your Name
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.bio: Passionate about creating innovative digital experiences, I develop modern and performant web applications. With expertise in React, TypeScript and Node.js, I love transforming complex ideas into elegant and intuitive solutions.

osPortfolio.title: OS Portfolio
osPortfolio.description: Immersive portfolio simulating an operating system
osPortfolio.longDescription: A unique interactive portfolio that simulates the experience of a personalized operating system. Developed with React, TypeScript and TailwindCSS, it offers an innovative user interface with draggable windows, an interactive terminal and smooth animations.

ecommerceApp.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerceApp.description: Complete e-commerce platform with integrated payment
ecommerceApp.longDescription: Full-stack e-commerce application with product management, shopping cart, Stripe payment system, admin dashboard and responsive user interface.

taskManager.title: Task Manager
taskManager.longDescription: Team productivity tool with project management, task assignment, time tracking and real-time notifications.

seniorDev.description: Development of complex web applications for enterprise clients. Technical lead on several projects, mentoring junior developers and performance optimization.

fullStackDev.description: Development of the startup's main application, from design to production. Working in an agile team with rapid development cycles.

frontendDev.description: Creating responsive and interactive user interfaces for websites and mobile applications. Close collaboration with UX/UI designers.

masterCs.description: Specialization in web development and software architecture. Final project on Progressive Web Apps.

licenseInfo.description: Complete training in computer science with focus on programming and algorithms.
